channel.title: Brand new Runesens!
channel.description:
I would to start by saying, the server has been posted before but now its got a new owner, new developers and new servers so the content has change and so has the ip's/clients
[img]http://i51.tinypic.com/2le57iv.png[/img]
[img]http://i45.tinypic.com/5tuon8.png[/img] Play Webclient:[url=http://runesens.com/play/]http://runesens.com/play/[/url] [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/5tuon8.png[/img] Download: [url=https://dl.dropbox.com/s/leomt64z9kr9048/ClientV2.jar]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/leomt64z9kr9048/ClientV2.jar[/url] [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/5tuon8.png[/img] Vote:[url=http://runesens.com/vote/] http://runesens.com/vote/[/url] [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/rh4phi.png[/img] Forum: [url=http://runesens.com/smf/]http://runesens.com/smf/[/url] [img]http://i48.tinypic.com/2qajsjb.gif[/img] Highscore: [url=http://runesens.com/highled]http://runesens.com/highled[/url]
Are you sick and tired of servers that have too many players? Are you sick and tired of servers that economy are too rare? Are you sick and tired of servers that have ungrateful staff and don't care about their players?
I was too until I found Runesens, The server that isn't too big and the staff care about their players, the economy is not too easy and not too hard you just have to work, There is various ways to earn money including, slayer, fletching, woodcutting and mainly bossing.
Unlike allot of servers Runesens is unique and isn't full of customs, in fact customs is rarely found in runesens, we like to stick to the way people loved it but with a nice twist.
The owner "Melee" is a dedicated person has has never let the server down, He has built the server from his own blood sweat and tears for over 2 years since the original PI source release (With a few breaks) and the motivation is still here!
The main aspect of Runesens is the community, one of the best communitys i have ever experienced and as a staff member myself its one of the main reasons i log on everyday for most of the day to help people, I know from personal experience that people don't like reading a long description but i'd just like to say, Why not give it a try? Add me in-game "Fire Cape" and make sure to register to the forums :)
Thank you very much, ill leave you now with some pictures and a feature list.
Have a nice day.
[b][size=10pt][center]Features[/center][/size][/b] -Caring And Helpful Staff! -Quick And Easy Access Bounty Hunter Worlds! -The Nicest Community You'll Ever Find! -Working Musics And Sound! -Much better Combat Than Alot Of Other Servers! -Fully Working Hunter With Nice Exp Rates! -Dungeoneering (bindings, boss, all Armour) -Quests & Achievements To Keep You Skilling All Day! -Ancients, Curses And Lunar! -Quick prays For Easy Praying Jad -HighScores For Each Difficulty -FullScreen Mode For You Graphic Lovers -Fully Working Summoning! -Sound & Music -Full GodWars with Nex -Pk Point System and kd!! -Toggle 10x Hits On Or Off -Full Godwars(all bosses) -All prayers working -Working Loot Share In Clan Chats -Many Monsters to train on -Working Vengance For You Pkers -Full Autocasting on magic -Staff Of Light -21 Trainable skills -Full Pvp weapons -All Specials Work -Working wilderness obelisk teleporters -Many Shops -Full functioning Clan Chat -Perfect Hybriding And Switching! -All Skills Work! -Minigames like: Pest Control, Assault Course, Fight Pits, Warrior Guild! -Working Defenders Including Dragon
[b]Diffcults:[/b] -Easy -Medium -Hard -Legend -Classic (Maybe in the future)
[b]Xp rates for medium:[/b] -Melee 630xp Per Hit -Range 630xp Per Hit -Mage 630xp Per Hit
[b]Commands[/b] :: Forum :: Empty :: Players :: Newhits :: Changepassword :: Skilling :: Music :: Soundon :: Soundoff :: Ice :: Tutorial :: Hunter :: Legend (Legend mode only!)
[b]Minigames[/b] - Assault - Fight Caves - Pest Control - Barrows - Duel Arena - Fight Pits
[b]Some Screenshots:[/b]
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3102887/Uten_navn10.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3102832/Uten_navn.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3102856/Uten_navn7.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3102844/Uten_navn3.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3102851/Uten_navn9.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3104044/Uten_navn12.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3102890/Uten_navn5.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3102853/Uten_navn1.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3102855/Uten_navn4.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3103998/Uten_navn11.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3104066/Uten_navn14.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3102859/Uten_navn2.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3102862/Uten_navn6.png[/img]
Join Now! http://runesens.com

item.title: Brand new Runesens!
item.dc:creator: @Java-RSPS-Noob Java-RSPS-Noob
item.description:
@Java-RSPS-Noob wrote:

[quote=“gaun, post:4, topic:526646”][quote author=Java-RSPS-Noob link=topic=645394.msg4350624#msg4350624 date=1376592403]
So wait, Jake quit as well now? Do I get my donor back? ( This is cruel truth from runesen forums )
[/quote]
Uhm, Jake is still owner, what happened to your donator anyway? I got seriously confused, Pm me some proof you donated before the reset on the forums and ill sort it out instantly[/quote]

Edit: You guys made it sound like the server (reset) again ?? I’m confused. Why is this being posted again? First melee made an advert a long time ago ( when I first donated ) , he quit so now Jake did an advertisement probably earlier this month. ( I rejoined the forums when they were redone ). So have you guys reset already again? -.-

Read full topic

item.title: Brand new Runesens!
item.dc:creator: @Runesenss Runesenss
item.description:
@Runesenss wrote:

I would to start by saying, the server has been posted before but now its got a new owner, new developers and new servers so the content has change and so has the ip’s/clients

2le57iv.png728×90

Play Webclient:http://runesens.com/play/
Download: https://dl.dropbox.com/s/leomt64z9kr9048/ClientV2.jar
Vote: http://runesens.com/vote/
Forum: http://runesens.com/smf/
Highscore: http://runesens.com/highled

Are you sick and tired of servers that have too many players?
Are you sick and tired of servers that economy are too rare?
Are you sick and tired of servers that have ungrateful staff and don’t care about their players?

I was too until I found Runesens, The server that isn’t too big and the staff care about their players, the economy is not too easy and not too hard you just have to work, There is various ways to earn money including, slayer, fletching, woodcutting and mainly bossing.

Unlike allot of servers Runesens is unique and isn’t full of customs, in fact customs is rarely found in runesens, we like to stick to the way people loved it but with a nice twist.

The owner “Melee” is a dedicated person has has never let the server down, He has built the server from his own blood sweat and tears for over 2 years since the original PI source release (With a few breaks) and the motivation is still here!

The main aspect of Runesens is the community, one of the best communitys i have ever experienced and as a staff member myself its one of the main reasons i log on everyday for most of the day to help people, I know from personal experience that people don’t like reading a long description but i’d just like to say, Why not give it a try? Add me in-game “Fire Cape” and make sure to register to the forums

Thank you very much, ill leave you now with some pictures and a feature list.

Have a nice day.

[size=10pt][center]Features[/center][/size]
-Caring And Helpful Staff!
-Quick And Easy Access Bounty Hunter Worlds!
-The Nicest Community You’ll Ever Find!
-Working Musics And Sound!
-Much better Combat Than Alot Of Other Servers!
-Fully Working Hunter With Nice Exp Rates!
-Dungeoneering (bindings, boss, all Armour)
-Quests & Achievements To Keep You Skilling All Day!
-Ancients, Curses And Lunar!
-Quick prays For Easy Praying Jad
-HighScores For Each Difficulty
-FullScreen Mode For You Graphic Lovers
-Fully Working Summoning!
-Sound & Music
-Full GodWars with Nex
-Pk Point System and kd!!
-Toggle 10x Hits On Or Off
-Full Godwars(all bosses)
-All prayers working
-Working Loot Share In Clan Chats
-Many Monsters to train on
-Working Vengance For You Pkers
-Full Autocasting on magic
-Staff Of Light
-21 Trainable skills
-Full Pvp weapons
-All Specials Work
-Working wilderness obelisk teleporters
-Many Shops
-Full functioning Clan Chat
-Perfect Hybriding And Switching!
-All Skills Work!
-Minigames like: Pest Control, Assault Course, Fight Pits, Warrior Guild!
-Working Defenders Including Dragon

Diffcults:
-Easy
-Medium
-Hard
-Legend
-Classic (Maybe in the future)

Xp rates for medium:
-Melee 630xp Per Hit
-Range 630xp Per Hit
-Mage 630xp Per Hit

Commands
:: Forum
:: Empty
:: Players
:: Newhits
:: Changepassword
:: Skilling
:: Music
:: Soundon
:: Soundoff
:: Ice
:: Tutorial
:: Hunter
:: Legend (Legend mode only!)

Minigames

  • Assault
  • Fight Caves
  • Pest Control
  • Barrows
  • Duel Arena
  • Fight Pits

Join Now! http://runesens.com
